feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [ERI][Network] - E104B02
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 3, 07:00 - 08:00 UTC

Mar 15, 02:41 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/04/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 03/04/2023 08:00 UTC
Service impact : During the maintenance, the rack E104B02 will be unreachable.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to upgrade the rack configuration.

entry.title: [Global][VMwarePrivateCloud] - vCenter major upgrade and and ESXi upgrade
entry.content:
Mar 20, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 15, 17:28 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 20/03/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 24/03/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere will be inaccessible during the maintenance. Hosts will be rebooted, but there is no impact as the hosts are in maintenance mode.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution and ESXi for customers with and without Zerto service.

entry.title: [SBG][Hosted Private Cloud] - Rack S345A07
entry.content:
Mar 16, 11:14 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 16/03/2023 09:39 UTC
End Time : 16/03/2023 11:10 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to a problem with the cooling system of the S345A07 rack.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Mar 16, 10:24 UTC
Identified - Start time: 16/03/2023 09:39 UTC
User impact : Some hosts are not available on the S345A07 rack.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : SBG1A
Root cause : Incident due to a problem with the cooling system of the S345A07 rack.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
